short_description: Efficient, Energy-Saving, and Fast Charging: The TowerTop trickle charger offers 3 adjustable current settings (2A/10A/AUTO) to meet your diverse needs. The max current is 10 amp, which can fully charge a 25Ah battery in just 2 hours. Compared to a 2A car battery charger, charging speed is increased by 647%. Smart Battery Charger & Fully Automatic Charging: Using advanced SMPS tech and a TowerTop Self-developed MCU chip, charging efficiency reaches 85% (industry average is 75%). The auto battery charger supports automatic battery detection, desulfation, and repair. TowerTop automotive battery charger knows your battery better. Compared to traditional transformer+rectifier designs (60% efficiency), it boosts efficiency by 48%, reduces size by 60%, and weight by 70%. Time to replace your bulky, outdated charger!

Plug-and-Play, Beginner-Friendly: Simply connect the 6v/12v battery charger to AC power and your battery. No extra steps needed. The battery chargers will automatically detect the battery status and start charging in 30 seconds. It switches to maintenance mode after full charge, with zero overcharging. You can also set it manually. The auto charger also has a memory function to remember the last settings, ensuring uninterrupted charging even during long-term use without worrying about power outages

All-in-One Design & 6 Professional Battery Modes: This automotive battery charger supports your 6V and 12V sealed lead-acid batteries, 12V deep cycle and 12V lithium (LiFeP04) batteries needs with 6 Professional charging modes: STD, GEL, AGM, Deep Cycle, Calcium, and LI (LiFePO4). Each mode uses an independent charging curve for better protection. Also compatible with Wet, MF, and EFB batteries. Perfect for cars, boats, RVs, trucks, motorcycles, powersports, and lawn tractors

HD LCD Screen and 8-Stage Intelligent Charging: With true 8-stage smart charging (desulfurization, soft start, bulk charge, absorption, analysis, repair, float, and pulse maintenance), it optimizes battery life and repairs batteries without overcharging or damaging them. The HD LCD screen allows you to view the charging stage and parameters at any time, keeping you informed of the charging status

Battery Repair: Independent desulfurization and repair buttons allow you to manually desulfurize and repair your battery to restore lost battery performance, helping to revive old/idle batteries and extend battery life. If your battery cannot be charged and the screen displays an error message: “PLEASE PUT THE CLAMPS ON,” you can try the "repair" mode to fix it. Note: It cannot repair completely drained batteries

Multiple Protections and Winter Mode: The charger provides multiple protections to ensure safe use, including spark-proof, reverse polarity, overcharge/discharge, overvoltage, overcurrent, overload, overheating, current backflow, short circuit, etc. The upgraded cooling system improves performance. Winter mode increases the charging voltage by +0.2V based on the original charging voltage, improving battery activity for more thorough charging in low-temperature conditions

name: NOCO GENIUS2D: 2A 12V Smart Onboard Battery Charger - Direct-Mount Automatic Maintainer, Trickle Charger & Desulfator with Overcharge Protection & Temperature Compensation – for Lead-Acid Batteries
short_description: MEET THE GENIUS2D — A direct-mount onboard battery charger for an under-the-hood battery charging. It's the all-in-one charging solution - battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, plus desulfator.
DO MORE WITH GENIUS — Designed for 12-volt lead-acid (AGM, Gel, SLA, VRLA) batteries, including flooded, maintenance-free, deep-cycle, marine and RV batteries.

DIRECT MOUNT — Securely attaches near the battery using a durable snap-fit mounting bracket and installs easily into most surfaces with truss-head self-tapping screws for a hassle-free, reliable setup.

ENJOY PRECISION CHARGING — An integrated thermal sensor dynamically adjusts the charge based on ambient temperature, preventing overcharging in hot weather and undercharging in cold, ensuring optimal battery performance.

CHARGE DEAD BATTERIES — Charge batteries from as low as 1 volt, or use Force Mode to manually charge completely dead batteries down to zero volts. Perfect for recovering deeply discharged or neglected batteries.

BEYOND MAINTENANCE — Keep your battery fully charged without worrying about overcharging. Our smart charger constantly monitors the battery, allowing you to leave it connected safely - indefinitely - for worry-free maintenance.

RESTORE YOUR BATTERY — Precision pulse charging automatically detects and reverses battery sulfation and acid stratification, restoring your battery's health for improved performance and extended lifespan.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX — Includes a 2A onboard charger, 24-inch AC cable, 24-inch DC cable with eyelet terminals, mounting bracket, screws, and a 3-year warranty. Proudly designed in the USA.
product_description: The GENIUS2D is the ultimate direct-mount onboard battery charger, designed for under-the-hood charging. It acts as a battery charger, maintainer, trickle charger, and desulfator, making it the perfect solution for 12-volt lead-acid batteries (up to 40 amp-hours), including AGM, gel, SLA, VRLA, flooded, maintenance-free, deep-cycle, marine, and RV applications. It is compatible with a vast array of vehicles, such as cars, automobiles, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, tractors, trucks, SUVs, RVs, campers, trailers, boats, pickups, classic cars, and more, including automotive brands like BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Bentley, Maserati, Lexus, Audi, Ford, Chevrolet, Corvette, Cadillac, Prius, Toyota, Subaru, Nissan as well as lawn and garden vehicles such as John Deere, Kubota, Toro and more. With its rugged snap-fit mounting bracket and truss-head self-tapping screws, installation is secure and effortless on most surfaces. The GENIUS2D can charge batteries as low as 1 volt and even offers Force Mode to manually charge completely dead batteries (as low as zero volts). Its advanced monitoring system keeps your battery fully charged without the risk of overcharging, while precision pulse charging reverses sulfation and acid stratification, restoring battery health and extending performance. The package includes a 2A onboard charger (120-240VAC), 24-inch AC and DC cables with eyelet terminals, a mounting bracket, screws, and is backed by a three-year warranty. Proudly designed in the USA, the GENIUS2D makes battery maintenance simple, reliable, and hassle-free.

product_description: Power up your garage with the Schumacher Electric SC1309 – a rugged, wheeled 6-in-1 automotive solution designed to handle everything from battery maintenance to emergency jump starts. Whether you're working on a car, truck, motorcycle, ATV, or marine vehicle, this versatile charger delivers reliable performance across 6V and 12V battery systems. With a powerful 200-amp 12-volt engine starter and a 40-amp boost charge mode, the SC1309 revives deeply discharged batteries fast. Its smart trickle charger and battery tender function maintains optimal charge levels without overcharging, making it ideal for long-term battery care. The unit also automatically detects battery voltage and adjusts the amp output for safe, efficient charging. Built-in diagnostics include a battery and alternator tester, helping you monitor battery health and electrical performance with ease. Housed in a durable metal case with solid wheels and a retractable handle, this charger is built for mobility and longevity. The SC1309 is AC powered and comes equipped with 6-gauge booster cables and a 6-foot power cord for extended reach. Whether you’re a DIY enthusiast or a professional technician, the Schumacher SC1309 is your go-to battery charger, engine starter, and maintenance tool—all in one. Adecuado para un taller profesional o un garaje doméstico, el cargador tiene la potencia necesaria para arrancar vehículos utilitarios deportivos, camiones y otros motores grandes. Tiene una capacidad de arranque del motor de 200 A, un modo de refuerzo de 40 A para baterías muy descargadas, un modo de carga/mantenimiento de 6 A<>2 A (12 V) y un modo de carga/mantenimiento de 2 A (6 V). Otra característica profesional es el probador de batería y alternador integrado, que muestra el nivel de carga y diagnostica problemas eléctricos. Totalmente automático, el SC1309 detecta el voltaje de una batería conectada y ajusta el amperaje por sí solo durante la carga y el mantenimiento. La carga multietapa utiliza un algoritmo avanzado para proporcionar una carga óptima y mantener la salud de la batería. Su resistente carcasa metálica garantiza que el SC1309 resistirá un uso intensivo, y sus ruedas compactas y manilla retráctil facilitarán su almacenamiento. Otras características incluyen una pantalla digital, indicadores LED, botones de control, cables de salida calibre 8 y pinzas metálicas codificadas por colores.

product_description: The Schumacher SC1400 is a rugged, fully automatic automotive wheeled battery charger and engine starter designed to deliver reliable performance in garages, workshops, and on the farm. Built for versatility and ease of use, this 4-in-1 car battery charger starts, charges, maintains, and reconditions batteries—making it a powerful tool for both everyday drivers and seasoned mechanics. With 300-amp 12V and 200-amp 6V engine start capabilities, the SC1400 charges fast and starts strong, even on deeply discharged batteries. It features a variable boost mode ranging from 60 amps to 20 amps, plus 6-amp to 2-amp 12V and 2-amp 6V charging/maintaining options. Whether you're working with standard, AGM, gel, or deep-cycle batteries, this 12V battery charger is compatible with most automotive and recreational vehicles, including motorcycles, ATVs, trucks, SUVs, and marine equipment. Engineered for safety and convenience, the SC1400 includes reverse polarity protection, auto voltage detection, and bad battery detection. Its multi-stage charging and float mode monitoring help extend battery life while preventing overcharging. A digital display, LED indicators, and push-button controls make it easy to monitor and manage charging. Built like the old-school chargers customers trust, the SC1400 features a sturdy steel case, heavy-duty clamps, and solid wheels that make it easy to move around the shop. While it’s a mid-duty unit, not industrial-grade, it’s praised for being heavy-duty and reliable—perfect for garage or farm use.
